  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib.AbstractDataset

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatchReadable<byte[],byte[]>, RecordScannable<KeyValue<byte[],byte[]>>, Dataset, MeteredDataset, Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.tephra.TransactionAware

extends AbstractDataset
implements BatchReadable<byte[],byte[]>, RecordScannable<KeyValue<byte[],byte[]>>
